name: HemoglobinCapillaryInMassPerVolume
title: Hemoglobin Capillary in Mass Per Volume
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests commonly used to measure hemoglobin done on a source of capillary blood with a reporting scale of mass/volume. These codes are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of capillary blood for hemoglobin.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include codes for hemoglobin with a source of capillary blood, with mass/volume as the measurement),(Exclusion Criteria: Hemoglobin lab test with any other source except capillary blood.)
